full_summary:
### Title: Elder Services, Ontario Region
#### Region: Ontario (except National Capital Region)

### Tender Reference Number: cb-4724-13896631

### Contract Award Announcement

The Government of Canada, through Correctional Services Canada (CSC), announces the pre-identified supplier for Elder Services in the Ontario Region. The procurement is subject to the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business and is set aside for an Indigenous supplier.

### Contract Overview

#### Background
The CSC strives to promote the reintegration of Indigenous offenders into their communities by providing culturally relevant programs and services. The Elder Services program aims to deliver spiritual and cultural guidance to help Indigenous offenders understand and connect with their traditional culture.

#### Requirements

* The successful bidder must be recognized by their community as an Elder or Cultural Advisor.
* A minimum of five (5) years of experience in delivering spiritual and cultural services to Indigenous people, obtained within the past ten (10) years prior to the ACAN closing date.
* Familiarity with and ability to conduct various ceremonies with a focus on healing.
* Ability to counsel and guide offenders regarding the protocols surrounding the use, disposition, and searching of traditional medicines and spiritual effects.

#### Scope of Work

The successful bidder will provide:

* Ceremonial and spiritual services, including counseling, teachings, and ceremonial services to Indigenous offenders.
* Advice and guidance to CSC staff and management on issues related to Indigenous spirituality and cultural practices.
* Case management, including participation in case conferences and providing verbally or in writing information regarding the offender's participation in a healing path.

### Evaluation Criteria

The tender will be evaluated based on the statement of capabilities submitted by interested suppliers. The successful bidder must demonstrate that they meet the minimum essential requirements outlined in the contract award notice.

### Contact Information

Danielle Murdoch, Regional Contract Administrator, Correctional Service Canada, Ontario Region, P.O Box 1174, 445 Union Street West, Kingston, Ontario, K7L 4Y8, Telephone: 343-422-4831, Email: danielle.murdoch@csc-scc.gc.ca

### Submission Deadline

April 27th, 2023, 2:00 PM DST.

### Notice Type

Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)

### Contract Category

Service (SRV)

### Regions of Opportunity

Canada

### Regions of Delivery

Ontario (except National Capital Region)

### Contract Period

Eleven (11) months, from May 1, 2023 to March 31, 2024
